name: WIZARD ANOTHER WORLD
description:
WIZARD ANOTHER WORLD - Welcome to the world of the wizard! You have been summoned to another world as a powerful sorcerer to protect it from danger. The inhabitants of the ordinary world were under threat due to attacks by various monsters, which took possession of their fortresses and forced people to flee.

You have to use your unique magical abilities to destroy all enemies and return peace and tranquility to these lands. While fighting monsters, you must collect magical artifacts that your enemies have stolen in order to restore the balance between light and darkness.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements, you need to complete set goals in the location and go through level after level.

Get ready for an exciting adventure full of dangers and mysteries! Use all your skills and ingenuity to defeat evil and save this magical world from destruction. Good luck, wizard!
